chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info:
Lord Weiramon Saniago,
      p. 81 (82)â€”High
      Lord of Tear.  Rand placed him in charge of his
      campaigns in Cairhien at first.  He also controlled part of the massive
      army Rand sent against Illian.
      His sign is a silver Crescent-and-stars.
